name: zeo3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wo(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0), wn(wbr(nat2, cdvds, c0))))

comment: An integer is even or odd. With this representation of even and odd integers, this variant of ~ zeo follows immediately from the law of excluded middle, see ~ exmidd . (Contributed by AV, 17-Jun-2021.)
